languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас не пытается увернуться или прикрыть лицо. Разбитая губа тут же набухает, и тонкая струйка крови немедленно стекает по его подбородку, теряясь за воротником.{/n} "И я положу жизнь, дабы искупить свои грехи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас не пытается увернуться или прикрыть лицо. Разбитая губа тут же набухает, и тонкая струйка крови немедленно стекает по его подбородку, теряясь за воротником.{/n} "И я положу жизнь, дабы искупить свои грехи".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас не пытается увернуться или прикрыть лицо. Разбитая губа тут же набухает, и тонкая струйка крови немедленно стекает по его подбородку, теряясь за воротником.{/n} "И я положу жизнь, дабы искупить свои грехи".

{n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは避けようとも、顔を守ろうともしなかった。彼の唇はすぐに腫れ、顎を伝って鮮血が静かに流れ、襟へと消えた。{/n}「この命を賭けて、過ちを償います」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは避けようとも、顔を守ろうともしなかった。彼の唇はすぐに腫れ、顎を伝って鮮血が静かに流れ、襟へと消えた。{/n}「この命を賭けて、過ちを償います」

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯没有闪躲，也没有出手格挡。他的嘴唇被你一拳打得肿了起来，细细的血线顺着他的下巴流进了衣领中。{/n}“我愿意以我的性命来弥补我的过错。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯没有闪躲，也没有出手格挡。他的嘴唇被你一拳打得肿了起来，细细的血线顺着他的下巴流进了衣领中。{/n}“我愿意以我的性命来弥补我的过错。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas no intenta esquivar el golpe ni taparse la cara. Su labio recién partido se inflama de inmediato y un riachuelo de sangre empieza a recorrer su mentón, desapareciendo por su cuello.{/n} «Y daré la vida para enmendar mis errores».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas no intenta esquivar el golpe ni taparse la cara. Su labio recién partido se inflama de inmediato y un riachuelo de sangre empieza a recorrer su mentón, desapareciendo por su cuello.{/n} «Y daré la vida para enmendar mis errores».

languages.text: {n}Il ne tente même pas d'esquiver ou de protéger son visage. Sa lèvre fendue gonfle à vue d'œil et un mince filet de sang serpente sur son menton avant de disparaître sous son col.{/n} « Et je suis prêt à donner ma vie pour expier mes fautes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il ne tente même pas d'esquiver ou de protéger son visage. Sa lèvre fendue gonfle à vue d'œil et un mince filet de sang serpente sur son menton avant de disparaître sous son col.{/n} « Et je suis prêt à donner ma vie pour expier mes fautes. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas versucht nicht, auszuweichen oder sein Gesicht zu bedecken. Seine gespaltene Lippe schwillt sofort an, und ein dünnes Blutrinnsal fließt sein Kinn hinunter und verschwindet in seinem Kragen.{/n} "Und ich werde mein Leben geben, um für meine Fehler zu büßen."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas versucht nicht, auszuweichen oder sein Gesicht zu bedecken. Seine gespaltene Lippe schwillt sofort an, und ein dünnes Blutrinnsal fließt sein Kinn hinunter und verschwindet in seinem Kragen.{/n} "Und ich werde mein Leben geben, um für meine Fehler zu büßen."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas ne kıpırdıyor ne de yüzünü korumaya çalışıyor. Açılan dudağı birden şişiyor, akmakta olan bir kan damlası da çenesinden bağrına inip kayboluyor.{/n} "Hatalarımın hesabını canımla ödeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas doesn't try to dodge or cover his face. His split lip swells immediately, and a thin rivulet of blood runs down his chin and disappears inside his collar.{/n} "And I will give my life to atone for my faults."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas ne kıpırdıyor ne de yüzünü korumaya çalışıyor. Açılan dudağı birden şişiyor, akmakta olan bir kan damlası da çenesinden bağrına inip kayboluyor.{/n} "Hatalarımın hesabını canımla ödeyeceğim."
